description: Create a report configuration with custom SQL mode

request_body.name: Revenue Analytics Dashboard
request_body.description: Daily revenue metrics and trends analysis

configuration.sql_query: SELECT DATE(transaction_date) as date, SUM(amount) as revenue, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2024-01-01' AND status = 'completed' GROUP BY DATE(transaction_date) ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 30
